item.title: By: BigFreak
item.dc:creator: BigFreak
item.description: Dunno what prices are like in the states but <a href="http://www.dvdboxoffice.com/175-3083575-12083580/games/pcgames/products/90198271?fs=true" rel="nofollow">DVDBoxOffice</a> are Canadian based, n ship world-wide for no extra fee. They might be expensive, I really wouldn't know.
item.content:encoded: Dunno what prices are like in the states but DVDBoxOffice are Canadian based, n ship world-wide for no extra fee. They might be expensive, I really wouldn’t know.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Blizzard store is out-of-stock on both regular and collector's versions of The Burning Crusade. (Guildmate tipped me to that, but I checked myself, cuz he's a paladin and we all know how unreliable they can be).
EBGames had regular versions available earlier today -- forgot to order a copy for my nephews' account. (OK, so I procrastinated too!)
item.content:encoded:
Blizzard store is out-of-stock on both regular and collector’s versions of The Burning Crusade. (Guildmate tipped me to that, but I checked myself, cuz he’s a paladin and we all know how unreliable they can be).

EBGames had regular versions available earlier today — forgot to order a copy for my nephews’ account. (OK, so I procrastinated too!)

item.title: By: Nyehn
item.dc:creator: Nyehn
item.description:
Jason, Blizzard has already started free opt-in transfers for selected severs, but the destination is fixed. ppl on Alleria can transfer to Baelgun for free. From what I've read on my guilds website (I'm on hiatus from WoW), queue counts were getting close to 500+. This is open to multiple high population servers, and new account creation capabilities for these "new" servers will be disabled for the time being.
Although less queue time = less jackholes to deal with, it's rumored Baelgun doesn't have AQ open yet. So be sure to look before you leap if your sever happens to have a free transfer window open up.
item.content:encoded:
Jason,
Blizzard has already started free opt-in transfers for selected severs, but the destination is fixed. ppl on Alleria can transfer to Baelgun for free. From what I’ve read on my guilds website (I’m on hiatus from WoW), queue counts were getting close to 500+. This is open to multiple high population servers, and new account creation capabilities for these “new” servers will be disabled for the time being.

Although less queue time = less jackholes to deal with, it’s rumored Baelgun doesn’t have AQ open yet. So be sure to look before you leap if your sever happens to have a free transfer window open up.

item.title: By: Heather
item.dc:creator: Heather
item.description:
Blergh. Hope they don't split my server. *sigh*
I'm a horrid procrastinator, but even I ordered copies for myself and my husband from Amazon back in... March? May? one of those M-months last year.
item.content:encoded:
Blergh. Hope they don’t split my server. *sigh*

I’m a horrid procrastinator, but even I ordered copies for myself and my husband from Amazon back in… March? May? one of those M-months last year.

item.title: By: jason
item.dc:creator: jason
item.description: I hope they plan on offering free server moves to some people... it would suck if, while both my account and my wife's accounts are cancelled, they split our characters up to different servers so we'd have to start over or pay to play together again. If it came to that, I don't think I'd every play WoW again.
item.content:encoded: I hope they plan on offering free server moves to some people… it would suck if, while both my account and my wife’s accounts are cancelled, they split our characters up to different servers so we’d have to start over or pay to play together again. If it came to that, I don’t think I’d every play WoW again.
